text: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger,
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya sebelum mereka telah Kami uji kaum Fir'aun dan telah datang kepada mereka seorang rasul yang mulia,
